item.title: Growing Pains
item.description: Did you know that there has been as 51 1 or 2 mana value rare and mythic red creatures printed into standard in since 2020? Hot on the heels of The Last Airbender, they have just spoiled another one even. When people talk about the state of standard for the last couple years of years there’s a lot of blame thrown at Commander or Universes Beyond influencing card design but no one seems to think about the number of cards being printed into Standard.
